item.title: Chronicles Of My First Arch Installation
item.description: I’ve been meaning to start a blog for a couple of months now, but I kept putting it off it, not knowing what to write about at first. Last week I installed Arch Linux on my laptop, so I guess this is the right place to start. If you don’t know what Arch Linux is, I’m glad to be the one to introduce it to you. You can read more about it here.
